episodes.title: Discussion with Nichole P & StraightWay Talk
episodes.description:
In this discussion Scotty and I sit down with Nichole who shares her story of being at Restoration City.  We also discuss what it was like traveling on the StraightWay Team and some of the behind-the-scenes things that were going on.

episodes.title: *Hot Takes & The Hot Seat*
episodes.description: In this episode Troy, Hannah, and myself discuss an overview of the previous interview with Melody and what it was like growing up in a rehab facility.  We also discuss the meaning behind 115, LIGHTT MEETINGS, and the HOT SEAT as we are coming to terms with the trauma that took place in these settings.

episodes.title: Shocking Secrets Revealed from a Cult Leaders Daughter
episodes.description: Cults and Overcomers - Interview with Melody

episodes.title: Cults and Overcomers - Interview with Melody
episodes.description: *There is discussion of sexual assault* In this episode I interview Melody who is the eldest daughter of the pastor who started Restoration City.  She tells her story as she is coming to terms with the reality of who her dad is and what Restoration City has become.

episodes.title: Cults and Overcomers - Interview with Manuel
episodes.description: In this interview I sit down with Manuel who came out of Restoration City.  He shares some of his experiences there and how it has affected his life.

episodes.title: Cults and Overcoming- Interview with Anita
episodes.description: In this interview I sit down with Anita who came out of the same cult I grew up in.  She explains her time at Restoration City and the impact it had.  This is a great interview in explaining some narcissistic tendencies within a cult.

episodes.title: Cults and Overcomers - Interview with Jon M
episodes.description:
In this episode I sit down with Jon who was a musician in the Christian music scene. He grew up in church and led praise and worship throughout this time. We have an interesting discussion as he exposes some of the things he went through as a child in a controlling church atmosphere to being a member in a Christian band performing throughout the country.

episodes.title: Cults and Overcomers - Interview with Kacey (The Cult Vault)
episodes.description:
In this episode Kacey from The Cult Vault joins me in discussing everything Cults.  We discuss why she got started and what she has learned in her interview process.  

Some of the topics we discuss are...
Coercive Control
Narcissistic Tendencies
Contrasting Beliefs
Documentaries (The Deep End & Keep Sweet Pray and Obey)
